nplcit.text: Cash flows reflected in the rating of the economic entities; International Journal of Business Research, v9, n2; March 2009; 8-pages
Contingent payments and debt contracts; De, Sankar; Kale, Jayant R; Financial Management, v22n2; Summer 1993; 21-pages

abstract.p: Methods and systems are provided herewith for rating a likelihood of payment of one or more cash flows. A computing device determines a probability of payment for one or more scheduled payments for each of one or more debt instruments in a debt instrument portfolio. The computing device may also determine a portfolio cash flow rating of the debt instrument portfolio based on the quantity and purchase price associated with each of the one or more debt instruments, the probability of payment for the one or more payments, a current market price of each of the one or more debt instruments, a net present expected value of the one or more payments in the payment schedule for each of the one or more debt instruments, and/or a credit rating of one or more issuers associated with the debt instruments.

A computing device receives information about a debt instrument portfolio comprising one or more debt instruments, the information comprising a quantity and a price associated with each of the one or more debt instruments. The computing device determines a current market price of each of the one or more debt instruments, and a payment schedule for each of the one or more debt instruments, each payment schedule comprising one or more payments, each payment schedule correlating a series of payment amounts with respective scheduled times of payment. The computing device determines a probability of payment for the one or more payments for each of the one or more debt instruments. The computing device may also determine a portfolio cash flow rating of the debt instrument portfolio, and outputs the portfolio cash flow rating to an output device.

bibliographic-data.invention-title: SYSTEME DE COTATION DE FLUX DE TRESORERIE

abstract.p: A computing device receives information about a debt instrument portfolio comprising one or more debt instruments, the information comprising a quantity and a price associated with each of the one or more debt instruments. The computing device determines a current market price of each of the one or more debt instruments, and a payment schedule for each of the one or more debt instruments, each payment schedule comprising one or more payments, each payment schedule correlating a series of payment amounts with respective scheduled times of payment. The computing device determines a probability of payment for the one or more payments for each of the one or more debt instruments. The computing device may also determine a portfolio cash flow rating of the debt instrument portfolio, and outputs the portfolio cash flow rating to an output device.

nplcit.text: Cash flows reflected in the rating of the economic entities; International Journal of Business Research, v9, n2; March 2009; 8-pages
Contingent payments and debt contracts; De, Sankar; Kale, Jayant R; Financial Management, v22n2; Summer 1993; 21-pages

abstract.p: Methods and systems are provided herewith for rating a likelihood of payment of one or more cash flows. A computing device receives information about a debt instrument portfolio comprising one or more debt instruments, the information comprising a quantity and a price (e.g., a purchase price) associated with each of the one or more debt instruments. The computing device determines a current market price of each of the one or more debt instruments. The computing device determines a payment schedule for each of the one or more debt instruments, each payment schedule comprising one or more payments, each payment schedule correlating a series of payment amounts with respective scheduled times of payment. The computing device determines a probability of payment for the one or more payments for each of the one or more debt instruments. In some embodiments, the computing device may also determine an expected net present value of the one or more payments. The computing device may also determine a portfolio cash flow rating of the debt instrument portfolio based on one or more of: the quantity and purchase price associated with each of the one or more debt instruments

and the probability of payment for the one or more payments. The cash flow rating may also be determined based on a current market price of each of the one or more debt instruments, a net present expected value of the one or more payments in the payment schedule for each of the one or more debt instruments, and/or a credit rating of one or more issuers associated with the debt instruments. The computing device outputs the portfolio cash flow rating to an output device.

nplcit.text: Cash flows reflected in the rating of the economic entities; International Journal of Business Research, v9, n2; Mar. 2009; 8-pages
Contingent payments and debt contracts; De, Sankar; Kale, Jayant R; Financial Management, v22n2; Summer 1993; 21-pages

abstract.p: Methods and systems are provided herewith for rating a likelihood of payment of one or more cash flows. A computing device determines a probability of payment for one or more payments on a payment schedule for each of one or more debt instruments of a debt instrument portfolio. The computing device may also determine a portfolio cash flow rating of the debt instrument portfolio based on the quantity and purchase price associated with each of the one or more debt instruments, the probability of payment for the one or more payments, a current market price of each of the one or more debt instruments, a net present expected value of the one or more payments in the payment schedule for each of the one or more debt instruments, and/or a credit rating of one or more issuers associated with the debt instruments.

bibliographic-data.invention-title: SYSTÈME DE COTATION DE FLUX DE TRÉSORERIE

abstract.p: A computing device receives information about a debt instrument portfolio comprising one or more debt instruments, the information comprising a quantity and a price associated with each of the one or more debt instruments. The computing device determines a current market price of each of the one or more debt instruments, and a payment schedule for each of the one or more debt instruments, each payment schedule comprising one or more payments, each payment schedule correlating a series of payment amounts with respective scheduled times of payment. The computing device determines a probability of payment for the one or more payments for each of the one or more debt instruments. The computing device may also determine a portfolio cash flow rating of the debt instrument portfolio, and outputs the portfolio cash flow rating to an output device.

Selon l'invention, un dispositif de calcul reçoit des informations concernant un portefeuille de titres de créance comprenant un ou plusieurs titres de créance, les informations comprenant une quantité et un prix associés à chaque titre de créance. Le dispositif de calcul détermine pour chaque titre de créance un prix de marché actuel et un échéancier des paiements, chaque échéancier des paiements comprenant un ou plusieurs paiements, chaque échéancier des paiements corrélant une série de montants à payer à des délais de paiement programmés respectifs. Le dispositif de calcul détermine une probabilité de paiement pour le(s) paiement(s) de chaque titre de créance. Le dispositif de calcul peut également déterminer une cotation de flux de trésorerie du portefeuille de titres de créance et l'envoyer vers un dispositif de sortie.
